snippet.title: The Adventures of Tintin - Mobile Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Relive Tintin's adventures in the official mobile game of the movie, full of exploration, mystery and more! You'll elude guards, solve puzzles, fly a plane and much more on your journey across the globe to find a legendary treasure!

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com

Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft

Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
